name: X2 Blocks - Merge Puzzle
description:
X2 Blocks Puzzle Game: Minimalistic & Elegantly designed Game which lets you think out of the box and sharpen your mind.

The Goal is to hit the same numbered blocks . The challenge increases gradually with large numbered blocks.

You get to enjoy this amazing new puzzle game while improving your memory, concentration levels and reflexes at the same time.

HOW TO PLAY

- Tap screen to hit blocks

- Merge same number blocks to get higher number block

- Use Power Up if you are stuck

GAME FEATURES

- Minimalistic & Elegantly designed Game.
- Smooth & simple controls.
- Easy to learn and play
- Automatic save game
- Global Leaderboards
- No time limits.
- Privacy Settings to keep your game Data Protected and Safe.

Enjoy,
X2 BLOCKS TEAM.
